Reviews.Author: Jess hayes
Reviews.Content: Excellent product!  Great price and everything works well. Looks used with scratches and dents but still well worth it for the money!
Reviews.Title: Great product for the money!

Reviews.Author: Mark C.
Reviews.Content: in all my experience with my iPad-its fun, very useful-and a cont do without tablet-i hardly use my Acer laptop anymore
Reviews.Title: Ive have nothing but good things to say...

Apple's iOS 4, 1 GHz dual-core Apple A5 custom-designed processor

9.7-inch (diagonal) LED-backlit glossy widescreen Multi-Touch display with IPS technology

2 lbs
